description: Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage - Acquisition of land - Pothgoda, Pathahewaheta D/S Division, Kandy District for Pthagoda Water Tank - Kondadeniya, Harispattuwa D/S Division, Kandy Districr for the Transmission line from Katugasthota Water Treatment Plant - Gunnapana, Kundasale D/S Division, Kandy District for the laying Pipe lines and access road for the Uyanwatta Water Tank - Varapitiya, Godakavela D/S Division, Ratnapuara District for the Bore hole and the Pump House
